post_content:
For sale is the T206 card for Chicago Cubs star outfielder Jimmy Sheckard.  The Tolstoi back comes with a PSA 3.5 rating. The sale price is ( $435, dropped from $485. I listed the card on EBay today, and it reminded me how little I enjoy purchasers paying sales tax, and sellers paying EBay fees. [emoji52])
I will include free shipping and insurance.
PayPal F&F would be nice, as would Zelle. However, if you feel uncomfortable with either of these methods of payment, you may use regular PayPal. I will not charge a fee for that choice. 
Leon has appropriately been warning people to be wary of fraud in buying cards. In that regard, I have the following information:
  1. My online EBay store is Vintage Tobacco. There, I have 533 transactions with zero dissatisfied customers.
  2. I have successfully purchased and sold cards through this forum in the past.
  3. I consider my reputation more important than any one transaction.

So, please respond if you are interested in this card, and thank you for looking.
Jeff
